summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Dream Journal achievements system and push notification features. Backend APIs working correctly (96.2% success rate), achievements page fully functional with proper categorization and visual indicators, notification infrastructure properly set up with service worker support.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - different error code but still blocks access correctly

passed_tests: Backend achievements API (/api/achievements) returns correct structure with 16 total achievements
Backend achievements check API (/api/achievements/check) working correctly
Demo user has correct 3 achievements unlocked: Dream Catcher, Seeker, Open Book
Achievements page displays all 7 categories properly grouped
Visual difference between unlocked (green checkmark) and locked (lock icon, opacity) achievements
Progress bars shown for locked achievements (13 found)
Dashboard achievements card shows correct stats and links to /achievements
Settings page notification permission handling working
Service worker registered and accessible at /sw.js
Reminder toggle and time selector functional in settings
Streak freeze functionality working (1 available, 0 used)
Achievement check API integration working on dashboard
All achievement categories present: Getting Started, Dream Collection, Consistency, Lucid Dreaming, AI Insights, Community, Exploration
